snippet: What the lawsuit over e-book pricing means; an interview with Andy Dunn, chief executive of Bonobos; and why oil prices are rising, but natural gas is getting cheaper.
abstract: What the lawsuit over e-book pricing means; an interview with Andy Dunn, chief executive of Bonobos; and why oil prices are rising, but natural gas is getting cheaper.

headline.main: Business Day Live: Stores Make Online Deals
